message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Alice,  $20,000 is way too high for me. I'm really interested in this product, but my maximum budget is $12,000.  Let me know if you're willing to work with me on that.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $20,000 reflects the value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $17,000.  This is my final offer.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $17,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm happy to pay $14,000. This is my final offer. Let me know what you think.
